summary:
## Ohio State University: A Quick Look

Ohio State University, located in Columbus, Ohio, is a large public research university with over 65,000 students. Founded in 1870, it offers hundreds of degree programs across 16 colleges. Ohio State is known for its strong research and athletics programs (Ohio State Buckeyes). Many famous people, including Nobel Prize winners and Olympic medalists, are Ohio State alumni.
title: Ohio State University
